name: Goodbye (Diego C. Torguet)
description:
Goodbye is an experimental narrative-driven first person game. Each game is an iteration of the same scene for knowing more about the world and its characters.

Controls

Arrow keys or 'a,s,d,w': Move

Left click: Select/Interact

Space(press): Faster Text

Escape: Pause

Code, Music, Art & Design by Diego C. Torguet (@DiegoCTorguet)

Rewriting by David Neely

Link to Music: Bandcamp
